---
title: "Treeflow benchmarks"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(treeflowbenchmarksr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r log_scale_plot}
comparisonPlot(
    snakemake@input[["plot_data"]]
)
```

```{r free_scale_plot}
comparisonPlot(
    snakemake@input[["plot_data"]],
    logScales=FALSE,
    scales="free_y"
)
```

```{r fits}
fitLogLogLine(snakemake@input[["plot_data"]]) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
